messages.zh: 第三关（前）
messages.en: Stage 3 (Before)

messages.zh: 最后，根据同位素的对比情况以及多种样本的最终分析，基本可以确认你们的猜想是对的。
messages.en: Lastly, based on the comparison of isotopes and the final analysis of various samples, you can basically confirm that your guess is correct.

messages.zh: 火山活动频率确实处于一个异常的爬升状态，虽然不至于马上爆发天灾，但是并不能对其视而不见。
messages.en: It is true that the frequency of volcanic activity is in an abnormal climbing state, although not immediately catastrophic, but it should not be ignored.

messages.zh: 火山活动应该会在二至四周之内到达临界点，之后就会引起火山天灾的爆发。
messages.en: Volcanic activity should reach a tipping point within two to four weeks, after which a volcanic disaster will erupt.

messages.zh: 可能的话，最好马上安排市民进行避难准备。
messages.en: If possible, it is best to arrange for the citizens to take shelter immediately.

messages.zh: ......以上，就是根据你们给出的情报得出的结论。
messages.en: ... And that's the conclusion based on the information that you've given to me.

messages.zh: 不愧是艾雅法拉，隔着联络竟然也能整整说了40分钟。
messages.en: You live up to your reputation Eyjafjalla, you sure can talk for 40 minutes straight through the comms.

messages.zh: 博士，你听懂了吗？
messages.en: Doctor, do you understand now?

messages.zh: 什么都没说一样。;嗯，结论我懂。
messages.en: I kind of understand it.; Well, I at least understand the conclusion part.

messages.zh: 我也觉得，反应过来的时候好像就结束了。
messages.en: I think so too, when I finally came to, the explanation was over.

messages.zh: 哇，博士真厉害，我完完全全没有听明白......
messages.en: Wow, Doctor surely is amazing. I totally missed it.

messages.zh: 看那边那两个人的样子，我还以为只有我听不懂呢。
messages.en: Look at those two people over there. I thought I was the only one who couldn't understand her.

messages.zh: 不愧是艾雅法拉，连我都重新上了一课呢。
messages.en: As expected of Eyjafjalla's reputation, even I feel as if I took a class.

messages.zh: 原来如此，不愧是专家，收集的这些数据原来还能从这个方向解读。
messages.en: So that's how it is, an expert indeed, the data collected turned out to be readable in this direction.

messages.zh: 没想到在这里能够学到这样的知识，天哪，我应该全部用笔记下来！
messages.en: I did not expect to be able to learn such knowledge here, my god, I should note all of this down!

messages.zh: 虽然目前情报还比较有限，不过我的判断和你们是一样的，这座火山很有可能已经从休眠状态进入了活化状态。
messages.en: Although the current information is limited, my diagnosis is the same as yours. It is possible that this volcano has gone from dormant to active.

messages.zh: 可惜我不在现场，没办法对于火山的活动原因进行进一步的探索。
messages.en: Unfortunately I'm not there myself, I can't further explore the cause of such volcanic activity.

messages.zh: ......对不起，如果有更多的现场情报我们甚至能找到火山活动的契机，更精确地确定活动的周期。
messages.en: ...I'm sorry, if we have more field intelligence then we could find the volcanic activity timing, and even determine the period of such activity more precisely.

messages.zh: 如果那样的话也能方便市民们做好转移安排。
messages.en: It would also make it easier to make the evacuation arrangements for the citizens.

messages.zh: 大家都明白你对火山的执着，艾雅法拉。
messages.en: Everyone knows of your obsession with volcanoes, Eyjafjalla.

messages.zh: 你已经帮了我们大忙了。辛苦你了。
messages.en: You've already been very helpful. Thank you very much.

messages.zh: 有你们这样专业的团队帮助我进行确认实在是太好了。
messages.en: It's great to have a professional team like yours to help me confirm my hypothesis.

messages.zh: 可能是因为仪器的问题，汐斯塔的观测点一直都读不出任何数据异常来。
messages.en: There could be a problem with the detector. Siesta's monitoring station so far has been unable to read any abnormal data.

messages.zh: 看来为此我的东奔西走还是值得的。
messages.en: It seems that my sudden trip is worthwhile.

messages.zh: 我们得赶快把这些消息带给市政府才行，不然后果肯定不堪设想。
messages.en: We must get this news to the city government quickly, or the consequences will be dire.

messages.zh: 你的意思不会是说，汐斯塔市在这个时候举办了如此大规模的节日活动，却一点天灾的准备都没有吧。
messages.en: You don't mean that with Siesta city holding such a large-scale festival at this time, the city has not made any preparation for a natural disaster.

messages.zh: 现在别说准备了，市民和游客甚至连天灾有可能产生都不知道。
messages.en: Let alone making any preparations now, both the citizens and the tourists are not even aware of the possibility of a natural disaster.

messages.zh: 我父亲在三个月前前往新开发区进行工作了，要在几天后才能回来，现在城里大大小小的事情都交给了他的秘书克洛宁处理。
messages.en: My father left for the new development zone three months ago and won't be back until a few days later. The runnings of the city now is left to his secretary, Kroenig.

messages.zh: 而克洛宁也是这座城市的天灾信使，我们只需要现在回去市政府，带回数据和其他样本，就可以让他了解情况了。
messages.en: And Kroenig is a natural disaster messenger of the city. We just need to go back to the city government now with the data and other samples, and then tell him the news.

messages.zh: 虽然我是市长的女儿，但是关于城市政府的事情我并没有太多参与。
messages.en: While I am the mayor's daughter, I do not have much involvement with the city government.

messages.zh: 不过现在既然已经得到了确实的证明，就可以让家里的人帮助我了。
messages.en: But now that I have the proof, I can ask my family to help me.

messages.zh: 博士，我有一个想法，我去火山进一步确认情况，我想试着找一找艾雅法拉提到的契机。
messages.en: Doctor, I have an idea. I will go to the volcano to confirm the situation further, and I want to try and find the opportunity mentioned by Eyjafjalla.

messages.zh: 锡兰这边能拜托你和其他人吗？
messages.en: Can Ceylon count on you and the others?

messages.zh: 进入火山？那也太危险了？！
messages.en: Into the volcano? That's too dangerous? !

messages.zh: 天灾信使的工作总是危险的，放心吧，在这方面我还是很有经验的。
messages.en: The work of a natural disaster messenger is always dangerous. Rest assured however, I am experienced in this field.

messages.zh: 虽然远程通讯只能在旅馆进行，不过我会随时和博士保持联络的。
messages.en: Although telecommunications can only be done in the hotel, but I'll be in touch with Doctor at all times.

messages.zh: 我也和你一起去。
messages.en: I shall go with you.

messages.zh: 欸。
messages.en: Err.

messages.zh: 你有什么意见？我可不放心，万一你破坏了重要的研究数据怎么办。
messages.en: Are you against it? I don't feel at ease with you going alone, what if you destroy the important research data?

messages.zh: 我当然是要跟你一起去。
messages.en: Of course I'm going with you.

messages.zh: 呃，没有意见没有意见。
messages.en: Well, I'm not against it. No I'm not.

messages.zh: 说起来，我们需要通知一下阿米娅吗？
messages.en: By the way, do we need to notify Amiya?

messages.zh: 不用啦。小事一桩而已，有博士知道就够了。
messages.en: There's no need. It's just a small matter. It's enough for Doctor to know.

messages.zh: 既然如此那我们就说定了，博士。也请你准备一下资料，我们下午两点就出发去市政厅。
messages.en: In that case, we have a deal, Doctor. Please prepare your information materials too. We are leaving for city hall at two in the afternoon.

messages.zh: 没问题。
messages.en: That's not a problem.

messages.zh: 呼，事情定下来后，总算可以稍微放松一下了。
messages.en: Phew, once things settle down, it's time to relax a bit.

messages.zh: 博士，我这里有一些从维多利亚带来的茶叶，来喝一杯茶吧。
messages.en: Doctor, I have some tea leaves from Victoria. Come and have a cup of tea.

messages.zh: 好吧。;不必了。
messages.en: It's alright. ;I don't need it.

messages.zh: 我想你一定会喜欢的。
messages.en: I think you will like it.

messages.zh: 是不会泡茶吗？那我亲手帮你泡一杯吧。
messages.en: Do you not know how to make tea? Then I shall personally make you tea.
It's okay.;...I don't drink tea.

messages.zh: 嗯哼，我想你一定会喜欢的。
messages.en: Uh-huh, I think you'll really like it.

messages.zh: 真是个麻烦的人。
messages.en: What a troublesome fellow.

messages.zh: 这可是在维多利亚中数一数二的茶叶哦？
messages.en: This is one of the best tea leaves in Victoria, you know?
I'm losing to you.;...It's not a bother, really.

messages.zh: 这就对了，我想你一定会喜欢的。
messages.en: That's right. I think you'll really really like it.

messages.zh: 我的泡茶手艺可是很好的，不尝一下会抱憾终身哦？
messages.en: My tea making skills are very good. If you don't give it a taste, you will regret it for the rest of your life, are you sure?
...Fine.

messages.zh: 真是个顽固的人，非要我这么说才能接受。
messages.en: What a stubborn person. Must I have to say it like that for you to accept it.

messages.zh: 那么，请稍等片刻。
messages.en: Just a moment, then.
